Project.Brief history of your project and organi: We've developed a one-click token issuance tool on Solana along with some related token issuance services. When users visit our website to create a token, they provide information such as the token's logo image and related videos, which we store on our website. We charge a fee based on the extent of features users utilize. Once users upload information, we store it on IPFS
